duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design and architecture of software systems to promote best practices across the company.
Define infrastructure evolution strategy based on business needs, industry trends, and technology stack.
Design and implement critical infrastructure systems including DPU, compute, storage, database, and networking.
Write papers and patent applications for cutting-edge software/hardware co-design solutions.
Research, analyze, and promote the next generation of technology stack for the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor/Master degree in computer-related fields. Ph.D. degree preferred.
